items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s Duo-Pro is the first tape made exclusively for hair extensions!">
items.storedetaileddescription: Beautify™’s Duo-Pro is the first tape made exclusively for hair extensions! Duo-Pro is designed with an effective and secure hold for the user, with one side of the tape built for the extension weft and one side for bio hair. With minimal residue for a quick and easy cleanup, Duo-Pro offers a low-maintenance solution for wearers and stylists.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Storage

 

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Seal bags completely. With proper storage, our tapes have a shelf life of up to one year.
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

Tabs

  1. Peel the liner off of the Duo-Pro tab.
  2. Place the Duo-Pro tab onto the extension weft.
  3. Repeat as needed.
  4. When you are ready to apply the extensions, peel off the tab liner and install it to the hair.
items.pagetitle: Beautify - Duo-Pro - Extension Tabs, 120pc/Bag | Walker Tape
